definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Sprinkle with the chopped spring onions and drizzle in light soya sauce and sesame oil.
sentences.chinese: 洒入葱花，淋上生抽麻油即可食用。

sentences.english: Turn off heatsprinkle with chili oil, Szechuan chili powder , to taste, half scallion.
sentences.chinese: 关掉火，洒入花椒油，花椒面和一半的葱花。

sentences.english: Divide the filling on the lettuce, sprinkle chopped green onion to garnish. Serve.
sentences.chinese: 在生菜叶上平均放上馅料，再洒上葱花作装饰即成。

sentences.english: Heat the wok and put in the oil and chopped Chinese onions.
sentences.chinese: 把炒锅烧热，放入油和葱花。

sentences.english: RMB 4.5 gets you four fried, greasy, and scallionscattered dumplings.
sentences.chinese: 花4块5角钱，买4个洒满葱花的油嫩生煎馒头。

sentences.english: The room is 1002 give me a portion of fried rice with meat only.
sentences.chinese: 我是1002房，给我送一份牛肉粒，葱花炒饭。

sentences.english: And the pot, heat in the dish and a layer on time.
sentences.chinese: 关火出锅，在盘子里的时候上面撒一层葱花。

sentences.english: Rub oil all over the surface of the dough, sprinkle with scallions and salt.
sentences.chinese: 在表面上抹油，撒上葱花和适量的盐。

sentences.english: Sprinkle with the green onions and remaining cheese.
sentences.chinese: 再撒上葱花和剩下的奶酪。

definition: same as 朝天椒[chao2 tian1 jiao1]
chicken bouillon powder (PRC)/essence of chicken, concentrated chicken stock sold as a tonic (Tw)
